tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE HomeInspections (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    inspection_date DATE,
    inspector_name VARCHAR(50),
    inspection_notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE inspections (
  inspection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  inspection_date DATE,
  property_id INT,
  inspector_id INT,
  result VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  maintenance_date DATE,
  property_id INT,
  maintenance_type VARCHAR,
  cost DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE HomeInspections (
	inspection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	inspection_date DATE,
	inspector_name VARCHAR(50),
	inspection_notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceRecords (
	record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	maintenance_date DATE,
	maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
	maintenance_notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE RepairRecords (
	repair_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	repair_date DATE,
	repair_type VARCHAR(50),
	repair_notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE home_inspections (
  inspection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  inspector_name VARCHAR(50),
  inspection_notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE maintenance_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  maintenance_date DATE,
  repair_type VARCHAR(50),
  cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE repairs (
  repair_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  repair_date DATE,
  repair_type VARCHAR(50),
  cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
  repair_notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE claim_investigations (
  claim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  investigation_date DATE,
  investigator_name VARCHAR(50),
  findings TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE home_inspections (
   inspection_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
   inspection_date DATE,
   inspector_name VARCHAR(50),
   property_address VARCHAR(100),
   inspection_notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE maintenance_records (
   record_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
   maintenance_date DATE,
   maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
   property_address VARCHAR(100),
   maintenance_notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE repairs (
   repair_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
   repair_date DATE,
   repair_type VARCHAR(50),
   property_address VARCHAR(100),
   repair_notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE claim_investigations (
   investigation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
   investigation_date DATE,
   investigator_name VARCHAR(50),
   claim_number VARCHAR(20),
   investigation_notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE claim_reviews (
   review_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
   review_date DATE,
   reviewer_name VARCHAR(50),
   claim_number VARCHAR(20),
   review_status VARCHAR(20),
   review_notes TEXT
)
